text: Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet.

text: Love the life you live, and live the life you love.

text: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively.

text: Who are you to judge the life I live' I know I'm not perfect -and I don't live to be- but before you start pointing fingers' make sure you hands are clean!

text: Truth is everybody is going to hurt you: you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.

text: Herb is the healing of a nation, alcohol is the destruction.

text: The hotter the battle the sweeter the victory.

text: In this bright future you can't forget your past.

text: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.

text: Don't gain the world and lose your soul; wisdom is better than silver or gold.
author: Bob Marley

text: Prejudice is a chain, it can hold you. If you prejudice, you can't move, you keep prejudice for years. Never get nowhere with that.

text: You just can't live that negative way. You know what I mean? Make way for the positive day cause it's a new day.

text: When you smoke the herb, it reveals you to yourself.

text: You not supposed to feel down over whatever happen to you. I mean, you're supposed to use whatever happen to you as some type of upper, not a downer.

text: Truth is, everybody is going to hurt you; you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.

text: When one door is closed, don't you know, another is open.
author: Bob Marley

text: Life is one big road with lots of signs. So when you riding through the ruts, don't complicate your mind. Flee from hate, mischief and jealousy. Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality .
author: Bob Marley

text: Beginnings are usually scary and endings are usually sad, but it's everything in between that makes it all worth living.
author: Bob Marley

text: Judge not before you judge yourself. Judge not if you're not ready for judgment.

text: Don't gain the world and lose your soul; Wisdom is better than silver and gold.

text: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice.

text: A hungry mob is an angry mob.

text: The things that seem insignificant to most people such as a note, song or walk become invaluable treasures kept safe in your heart to cherish forever.

text: I handle fame by not being famous. I'm not famous to me.

text: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.

text: Never do they hurt your feelings or make you feel like you are not good enough, but rather they build you up and show you the things about yourself that make you special and even beautiful.

text: You can't run away from yourself.
author: Bob Marley

text: Money can't buy life.

text: As a man sow, shall he reap. and I know that talk is cheap. But the heat of the battle is as sweet as the victory.

text: Before pointing fingers make sure your hands are clean.

text: JAH would never give the power to a baldhead. Run some crucify the dread. Time alone, oh! time will tell. Think you're in heaven, but you living in hell.

text: The day you stop racing, is the day you win the race.
author: Bob Marley

text: Just can't live that negative way, make way for the positive day.

text: The winds that sometimes take something we love, are the same that bring us something we learn to love. Therefore we should not cry about something that was taken from us, but, yes, love what we have been given. Because what is really ours is never gone forever.
author: Bob Marley

text: Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality.

text: Just because you are happy it does not mean that the day is perfect but that you have looked beyond its imperfections.

text: You can fool some people sometimes, but you can’t fool all the people all the time.

text: Beginnings are usually scary, and endings are usually sad, but it’s everything in between that makes it all worth living.

text: Until the philosophy Which hold one race superior And another inferior, Is finally and permanently, Discredited and abandoned Everywhere is war.
author: Bob Marley

text: When you smoke herb, it reveals you to yourself.
author: Bob Marley

text: I do smoke, but I don't go through all this trouble just because I want to make my drug of choice legal. It's about personal freedom. We should have the right in this country to do what we want, if we don't hurt anybody.
author: Bob Marley

text: Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery. None but ourselves can free our minds.
author: Bob Marley

text: Life and Jah are one in the same. Jah is the gift of existence. I am in some way eternal, I will never be duplicated. The singularity of every man and woman is Jah's gift. What we struggle to make of it is our sole gift to Jah. The process of what that struggle becomes, in time, the truth.
author: Bob Marley

text: The more people smoke herb, the more Babylon fall.
author: Bob Marley

text: My music fights against the system that teaches to live and die.
author: Bob Marley

text: Judge not, before you judge yourself. . Judge not, if you're not ready for judgment. . The road of life is rocky and you may stumble too, . So while you talk about me, someone else is judging you.
author: Bob Marley

text: You may not be her first, her last, or her only. She loved before she may love again.
author: Bob Marley

text: Truth is everybody is going to hurt you, you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.

text: I don't stand for black man's side, I don't stand for white man's side, I stand for God's side.
